about_the_game:
Are you ready for an adventure that will make your brain boil and your fingers dance across the keys? Meet BlockBot - not just a game, but a real challenge to your creativity!

🤖 Who is BlockBot?

Imagine a transformer box, but instead of cool guns, he has a limitless ability to change his shape. Our hero is like a Rubik's cube, only alive and with personality! He can stretch, shrink, turn into a bridge or a ladder - everything to get through the maze of puzzles!

🌈 A world where every pixel counts

Forget about reality! Here each level is a separate universe where the laws of physics dance to the tune of your imagination. Do you want gravity in reverse? Please! Teleportation through walls? Easy! The main thing is not to forget where is the top and where is the bottom!

🧠 A brain and reflexes challenge

You'll start off as a clumsy box, tripping over every ledge. But by the end? Oh, you'll be a virtuoso of geometric transformations! Your brain will learn to think in five dimensions and your fingers will move faster than thought!

🎵 A soundtrack that makes your ears ring (in a good way!)

The music here isn't just a background - it lives, breathes and seems to suggest solutions. Every beat is like the pulse of this strange world. Don't be surprised if you catch yourself humming BlockBot's melodies in your soul!

👾 Graphics soaked in nostalgia for the future

The pixels here aren't just a tribute to fashion - they're a portal to a world where every square on the screen makes sense. The mix of old-school aesthetics and futuristic ideas creates a visual cocktail that's impossible to look away from.

🏆 The path of the hero... or madman?

With each level you'll feel like a genius or a complete profane. But that's okay! In the world of BlockBot, the line between genius and madness is as thin as a single pixel.

Are you ready to dive into this square space? BlockBot is waiting for you - and believe me, it will be a journey you won't forget. Even if you try really hard!

P.S. The developer is not responsible for space-time warping in your head after playing the game. But guarantees that it will be fun!

Are you ready for an adventure that will make your brain boil and your fingers dance across the keys? Meet BlockBot - not just a game, but a real challenge to your creativity!

🤖 Who is BlockBot?

Imagine a transformer box, but instead of cool guns, he has a limitless ability to change his shape. Our hero is like a Rubik's cube, only alive and with personality! He can stretch, shrink, turn into a bridge or a ladder - everything to get through the maze of puzzles!

🌈 A world where every pixel counts

Forget about reality! Here each level is a separate universe where the laws of physics dance to the tune of your imagination. Do you want gravity in reverse? Please! Teleportation through walls? Easy! The main thing is not to forget where is the top and where is the bottom!

🧠 A brain and reflexes challenge

You'll start off as a clumsy box, tripping over every ledge. But by the end? Oh, you'll be a virtuoso of geometric transformations! Your brain will learn to think in five dimensions and your fingers will move faster than thought!

🎵 A soundtrack that makes your ears ring (in a good way!)

The music here isn't just a background - it lives, breathes and seems to suggest solutions. Every beat is like the pulse of this strange world. Don't be surprised if you catch yourself humming BlockBot's melodies in your soul!

👾 Graphics soaked in nostalgia for the future

The pixels here aren't just a tribute to fashion - they're a portal to a world where every square on the screen makes sense. The mix of old-school aesthetics and futuristic ideas creates a visual cocktail that's impossible to look away from.

🏆 The path of the hero... or madman?

With each level you'll feel like a genius or a complete profane. But that's okay! In the world of BlockBot, the line between genius and madness is as thin as a single pixel.

Are you ready to dive into this square space? BlockBot is waiting for you - and believe me, it will be a journey you won't forget. Even if you try really hard!

name: Block Bot: Puzzle Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 53 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: BlockBot: Shape-shifting puzzle adventure in a vibrant pixel world. Transform, solve, explore. Each level unlocks new potential. Perfect for quick plays or long sessions, offering unique challenges every time you dive in.
